# ðŸ¤– Sub-Issue: AI-Powered Candidate Matching Engine

## Goal
Develop an AI-driven matching engine to score student applications against referral requirements, provide skill gap analysis, and recommend top matches.

## Tasks
- [ ] Implement NLP-based skill extraction from job descriptions
- [ ] Build match score calculation service and API endpoints
- [ ] Integrate match scores into student dashboard and referral cards
- [ ] Add skill gap analysis and recommendations
- [ ] Send email/push notifications for high-match referrals
- [ ] Write tests for matching algorithm accuracy and performance

## Acceptance Criteria
- Match scores and skill gaps are visible to students
- Top matches are recommended and notifications sent
- Algorithm is documented and tested for accuracy
